channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 15 Best Food Gifts, as Tested by Our Tastebuds (2025)
item.description: From tinned fish to baked goodies, you can deliver the best-tasting treats to their door—even if you don’t live close by.

item.title: « En s’accrochant désespérément au moteur thermique », l’Europe est-elle en train de donner les clés de notre industrie automobile à la Chine ?
item.description: Sous la pression de l'Allemagne, la Commission européenne propose officiellement de revenir sur le dogme du "tout électrique", offrant un sursis inespéré aux moteurs thermiques via une usine à gaz réglementaire. Un revirement politique vendu comme du pragmatisme, mais qui ressemble furieusement à un sabordage industriel face à la Chine.

item.title: Bluesky claims its new contact import feature is ‘privacy-first’
item.description: Bluesky is finally letting you find people you already know, one of several common features on other social platforms, like notifications and bookmarks, that have been notably absent at the growing upstart. Unlike rivals, it claims it's not sacrificing privacy to do it. The Find Friends feature is "privacy-first by design," unlike what Bluesky says […]...

item.title: Entre Netflix et Paramount, Warner Bros a choisi son camp
item.description: Le feuilleton qui secoue Hollywood vient de prendre un tournant décisif. Le conseil d’administration de Warner Bros Discovery a tranché : il demande à ses actionnaires de rejeter l’offre de 108 milliards de dollars de Paramount Skydance. Pourquoi refuser un tel chèque ? Parce que derrière les chiffres, la réalité financière est bien plus fragile qu'il n'y paraît. ...

item.title: Get half off MasterClass subscriptions for the holiday season
item.description:
If you want to learn a new skill in the new year or brush up on some skills you already have, MasterClass could be a good option for you. It's even more accessible now that the company is running a holiday promotion that knocks 50 percent off subscriptions. For the top-tier Premium plan, which includes offline mode and use on up to six devices, you'll pay $120 for the year instead of the usual $240. The entry-level plan, which supports just one device and doesn't offer offline viewing, is marked down to $60 from $120.
Over the past few years, MasterClass has grown to over 200 classes, sessio...

item.title: Adobe Rolls Out Free Generative AI for Creative Cloud Pro Users as a Limited-Time Bonus
item.description: Over 20 AI-enhanced apps and tools, including unlimited Firefly and 3rd-party image generations, make Adobe the industry leader.

item.title: Amazon & Co s’habillent en père Noël pour livrer vos cadeaux à temps : voici les meilleures offres Tech à glisser sous le sapin
item.description: Si vous n'avez pas encore fini vos achats de fin d'année, pas d'inquiétudes. Il reste encore une semaine et beaucoup d'enseignes comme Amazon, Boulanger ou encore Cdiscount et Fnac-Darty, continuent de faire des offres avec une livraison garantie avant le 25 décembre. Voici les promotions en temps réel qui peuvent sauver votre Noël.

item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery rejects Paramount's hostile bid
item.description: Warner Bros. Discovery's board has formally rejected the $108 billion takeover bid from Paramount Skydance, the company announced. WBD said it remains committed to its $82.7 billion deal with Netflix, which would close some time next year, pending regulatory approval. "[The board] has unanimously determined that the tender offer launched by Paramount Skydance on December 8, 2025 is not in the best interests of WBD and its shareholders and does not meet the criteria of a "Superior Proposal" under the terms of WBD's merger agreement with Netflix announced on December 5, 2025," the studio said i...

item.title: 17 Best Stocking Stuffers (2025): Unique and Unconventional
item.description: Start off on the right foot (and buy the grown-ups some time to make coffee) with these excellent, tiny gifts.

item.title: Vacuum cleaner features ranked from 'essential' to 'unnecessary', by a professional tester
item.description: From headlamps to sliders, these are the features worth prioritizing, and those you can ignore.

item.title: Venezuelan oil giant PVDSA hit by cyberattack amid US conflict
item.description: The Venezuelan Oil Ministry has been hit by a cyberattack, which it believes was carried out by the US.

item.title: Gizmodo Tech Reporter Jody Serrano’s 11 Fun and Funky Coffee Mugs for Those Who Think It’s Too Complicated to Give Tech Gifts
item.description: What's the common denominator among all tech enthusiasts? Coffee mugs. They're the best underrated gift. The nerdier the better.

item.title: The best subscription gifts to send to your loved ones this Christmas: Disney+ bundle, MasterClass, Field Notes and more
item.description: There are way too many online services and subscriptions to keep track of these days, but the flip side is there’s a tool for just about everything. Time is just about up to get a physical gift shipped in time for the holidays, so below we’ve pulled together some of our favorite digital gifts and subscriptions, including time-tested video, music and gaming services as well as tools to clear your mental space and learn new skills. There are also a few subscriptions that provide ongoing, IRL deliveries, if you think your giftee will appreciate the nostalgic charm of a physical object. Best digit...

item.title: In 2025, wearables made a hard pivot to AI
item.description: Years from now, I'll look back at 2025 as the year when a fundamental shift happened in wearable technology. Over the last decade, the category has been synonymous with health and fitness. In many ways, that association is still the primary one. But this year, I've seen an increasing number of tech companies pitch another […]

item.title: Alexa Home Theater: Everything you need to know about Amazon's newest Echo feature
item.description: When Amazon’s latest Echo speakers arrived in October, a feature the company spent time hyping during its fall devices event was missing. Alexa Home Theater arrived in late November, allowing owners of a recent Fire TV device and either of the new Echo speakers the ability to use up to five units and an Echo Sub as a surround sound setup. The main selling point is that the underlying tech allows you to put the speakers wherever you want and Alexa Home Theater will handle the rest. A robust array of speakers is a considerable investment, though, and there are limitations to Amazon’s latest play...

item.title: Microsoft explains how Windows 11's AI agents will get access to your files – but bigger worries remain
item.description: Microsoft calms some fears about Windows 11's AI agents, clarifying permissions around file access.

item.title: Le télescope Nancy Grace Roman percera-t-il l'énigme de l'énergie noire en étudiant les vides cosmiques ?
item.description: L'expansion de l'Univers semble s'accélérer sous l'effet paradoxalement répulsif de la gravitation en présence de la mystérieuse énergie noire. Mais sa nature sera peut-être révélée en étudiant les étranges vides cosmiques entre les filaments formés d'amas de galaxies.

item.title: La bonne affaire du jour, c’est ce TV 4K QLED gigantesque de 98″ et 144 Hz avec 480 € de remise
item.description: Même si ce n'est pas à la portée de tous, il est possible d'avoir un TV géant d'une diagonale de 98 pouces pour un prix raisonnable, comme ce TCL 98P8K qui passe de 1 999 euros à 1 521 euros grâce à un code promo.

item.title: A Revamped iMac Pro Could Be Big, Expensive, and Exactly What I Need
item.description: A giant iMac would also cost a fortune.

item.title: OpenAI reveals major hire to lead global Stargate data center expansion
item.description: OpenAI's Stargate expansion to boost government adoption of AI is being led by former UK Chancellor George Osborne.

item.title: Walmart just dropped a gaming laptop with an RTX 5070 Ti for $1,299 – the lowest price I've seen yet
item.description: Get an MSI gaming laptop with a high-end RTX 5070 Ti graphics card for just $1,299 with this last-minute deal at Walmart.

item.title: Grab the Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones for a record-low price — and get some five-star earbuds for free
item.description: The Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones are some of the best cans around, and right now, you can get them for a record-low price – and get some excellent earbuds for free.

item.title: Samsung seems to be focusing on foldables in 2026 – here are 3 possible reasons why
item.description: With the Galaxy Z Trifold on the way and rumors of a small upgrade for the Galaxy S26 series, it seems that Samsung is betting big on its folding phones for next year.

item.title: Over 30% of all new music on Deezer is AI-generated – and most people can't tell the difference
item.description: 97% of people can't tell if music is AI-generated – and over 30% of all new tracks are.

item.title: The Weirdest Medical Cases of 2025
item.description: Lactating armpits, deadly burgers, and the world's nosiest parasite are some of this year's most bizzaro medical tales.

item.title: Amazon reportedly in talks to invest $10B in OpenAI as circular deals stay popular
item.description: Amazon is in early discussions to invest as much as $10 billion in OpenAI in a deal that would see the AI lab using the e-commerce giant's AI chips.

item.title: The Directors of ‘Final Destination Bloodlines’ May Have Their Next Sci-Fi Epic
item.description: Zach Lipovsky and Adam Stein are attached to direct an adaptation of the sci-fi novel, 'The Traveler.'

item.title: How to Watch the Final Meteor Shower of 2025
item.description: Conditions in the US should be perfect for the final meteor shower of 2025, with no moonlight present to interfere with spotting shooting stars.

item.title: People Are Paying to Get Their Chatbots High on ‘Drugs’
item.description: An online marketplace is selling code modules that simulate the effects of cannabis, ketamine, cocaine, ayahuasca, and alcohol when they are uploaded to ChatGPT.

item.title: What is the release date for Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 4 on Starz?
item.description: Strap in, because we're about to witness the most spectacular cliffhanger, but when is Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 4 on Starz?

item.title: The year of the tactical vest
item.description: The menacing garments are showing up everywhere from ICE raids to fitness influencers. In late October, dozens of federal law enforcement officers flooded Canal street, a busy thoroughfare in Manhattan, arresting street vendors. Some officers donned full military uniforms; some wore plain clothes, baseball caps, and neck gaiters pulled over their faces. All were equipped with tactical vests of various styles and with a medley of identifying patches—“HSI,” “Customs and Border Patrol,” “Federal Agent,” or, simply, “Police.” ...

item.title: Dans un monde où le prix des SSD ne cesse d’augmenter, le Samsung 990 Pro 2 To perd 85 € chez Amazon
item.description: Entre sa capacité de 2 To et son dissipateur thermique pour empêcher la surchauffe, ce Samsung SSD 990 Pro possède bien des qualités. Retrouvez-le pour 189,99 euros au lieu de 274,99 euros. Une belle affaire à une époque où le prix des SSD ne cesse d'augmenter.

item.title: You can get almost half price off Xbox Wireless Controllers right now if you're looking for a last-minute gaming gift
item.description: Loads of Xbox Wireless Controllers have just dropped to lowest-ever prices ahead of the Holidays.

item.title: Tesla misled customers about self-driving features, judge rules
item.description: Tesla could be temporarily locked out of its biggest US market if it doesn't change deceptive marketing that exaggerates the self-driving capabilities of its cars, the California Department of Motor Vehicles warned on Tuesday, adopting the ruling of an administrative law judge. The DMV said Tesla's use of terms like "Autopilot" and "Full Self-Driving" to […]...

item.title: Nouveau succès pour Ariane 6 : pourquoi ce lancement est une bonne nouvelle pour votre GPS
item.description: Ce mercredi matin, Ariane 6 a placé deux satellites Galileo en orbite. Ce cinquième succès confirme que le lanceur est fiable et marque la fin de la dépendance européenne envers les prestataires étrangers.
